attributes.action: Help those people with disabilites / long term chronic illness with mortgage payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who pay rent for the property they live in automatically have their rent paid for them by the social if they are unable to work. Those unfortunate to be either too sick or disabled to continue to work are having their homes repossesed because they can no longer keep up with their mortgage payments, these people do not receive help for full payment even though the mortgage payment may be less than someone paying rent. Basically someone on the dole, can get rent paid for them of 600 per month, someone who has to give up work due to illness / disability doesnt.
